Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and into the terminal, due to a festival near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Buses will operate in both directions via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and then into the terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

 

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to Fiesta Boricua.

Headline: Delays Affecting Brown Line Trains
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/significant delays from congestion after earlier track switching problems near Kimball. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with significant delays from congestion after earlier track switching problems near Kimball. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Crews are working to clear the congestion that's formed the problem and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem near Clinton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem near Clinton.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
